summary: A Dryads home under the roots of a big tree.
descriptionHtml:
"Vainly on beech and oak I knock
Amid the silent boughs;
Then hear her laughter,
The moment after,
Making of me her laughing-stock
Within her hidden house."
 - Richard Le Gallienne


This mod was made especially with "The Dryad" ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21458//? )  in mind.
This is not required but i recomend it, awesome race mod!
I didn't find any of the other treehouse-mods to be what i wanted from a dryads den and why on earth would a treespirit live in a house? Made from wood?
I wanted something simple that felt more like the dwelling of a spirit than a furnished house.

So i created this, my first ever mod.

What does it do?
The mod adds a simple player home under the roots of a big tree in Autumnshade Clearing, northwest of Riften.

How?
Go there, kill the critters/hunters there and find the tree.
You wont miss it.
Between some rocks a door is nestled that leads to the Roots of the Tree.

Features?
Not many.
A bedroll, a tanning rack, a hollowed out rock next to the bedroll for keeping stuff in.
Some baskets filled with fruit and veg, a buttload of butterflies and a lot of herbs.
Glowing mini-version of the big home tree. 
Skulls of men lie strewn about, don't you bring an axe to her home tree!

Mod as you like!


--------------

I added a second version with a waterfall and spring.
I'm still feeling that the upper level is missing something but i can't figure out what.
author: Floveus
